DOC.brief_summary: This is randomized controlled trial investigating the effects of direct swallowing training and oral sensorimotor stimulation in preterm infants on oral feeding performance.
DOC.brief_title: Direct Swallowing Training and Oral Sensorimotor Stimulation in Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Preterm infants : 24+0 ~ 32+0 weeks gestation Appropriate for gestational age infants (birth weight : 10% ~ 90%) Infants who are receiving full tube feeding (more than 120 kcal/kg/day) Infants who discontinue of nasal continuous positive airway pressure before postmenstrual age 33+0 weeks 'Feeders and growers' Major congenital anomalies : face, central nervous system, gastrointestine, heart, etc Gastrointestinal complications Chronic medical complications : Intraventricular hemorrhage Grade III or IV, periventricular leukomalacia, surgical necrotizing enterocolitis
